posts.post_content: Any Detroit Gypsy Queens out there?

Joe-I can help with images but I have no duplicates.

Best—Jay

Thanks Jay, I know you are looking for these too. If you can send me a list of Detroit players that you have or known Detroit players that would be great Don,t need actual images.  Email [url]JCMTIGER68@gmail.com[/url]. Thanks. Joe

Hello Joe,

I've watched the Detroits pretty close and believe all the 1887 Detroit poses were issued as GQ with exception of Stump Weidman as he had left the team by late 1887.  However, not all the poses have been catalogued.  With their population being so low, many have been lost to time.

If I go by the 0 number, the following are catalogued as GQs

0487 Thompson
0488 Thompson
0489 Twitchell
0490 Twitchell
0491 Twitchell
0492 Ganzel
0494 Ganzel
0496 Rowe
0497 Rowe
0498 Richardson
0499 Richardson
0501 Hanlon
0502 Hanlon
0503 Hanlon
0504 Brouthers
0505 Brouthers
0506 Brouthers
0507 Watkins
0508 Thompson

So the missing numbers that are waiting to be discovered are as follows:

0485 Thompson
0486 Thompson
0493 Ganzel
0495 Rowe
0500 Richardson

The players that have all their poses accounted for as GQs would be Twitchell (3), Hanlon (3), Brouthers (3), and Watkins (1).
Good Luck Joe ! Now you have a list that will probably remain very long, for a long time. Hope you can cross some off.
Thanks Joe G & Jay. Good info.  Thanks Mike, it would be nice to find a few. Unfortunately all my N172 wants are tough too.
